extendedInfo.description: Command your officers and crew from the bridge of your star ship to travel, trade, and battle across the immense Star Traders Quadrant.  Employ a wide variety of strategies as an Assassin, Bounty Hunter, Trader, Pirate or Smuggler.  Can you manage your resources, crew and officers well enough to turn a profit in the complex economy thatâs sprawling across the on-going interstellar conflict?Try the free version, "Star Traders RPG" before you buy.  Enjoy hours of turn-based strategy before you go Elite. The Trese Brothers never run ads in our games -- enjoy an ad free, permission free experience!Then experience the Elite Upgrade and copy all your captains!  Elite includes more than 200 new planets, more than 2,000 new sectors in the massive galaxy, over 200 new ships, twice as many rumors and officers, and more unique art!  And you can copy any captain from Star Traders (free) to Elite!This epic space pirate RPG offers a deep and challenging world and economy to Star Trading captains.  You must navigate the waters of Quadrant politics and chose sides among the constantly conflicting Factions, or take the risk to stay independent.  Enjoy endless replay value in this deep space civ and trading simulation which allows you to take any path you want as a captain.  Act as a pirate against the merchants using the great shipping lanes, join the Solar War as a military captain, or hunt targets across the Quadrant as a fearsome bounty hunter!Star Traders is a turn-based strategy role playing game (RPG) inspired by games such as EVE Online, Space Trader, Master of Orion, Pirates! and many other classic computer RPGs.  If you enjoy retro games, adventure and tactics games, Action RPG or Sci-fi RPG with complex depth (such as Master of Orion or Mass Effect) you may enjoy Star Traders space trading simulation.Our development team is actively continuing development and updates of this indie RPG based on your feedback and is regularly updated with new content, features, and fixes.  Please email us with suggestions or bugs!As a Star Trading captain you will:- Explore more than 300 planets- Trade in and manipulate the complex and deep economy in this economic simulator- Buy, sell, and battle over 500 unique starcraft- Customize and design your space craft with more than 50 upgrades- Fully customize your captain (picking from 6 classes), officers and space shipsExperience the Elite upgrade:  the epic new content includes 2,000 new sectors, 200 additional planets, and hundreds of additional ships, more rumors, art board, and officers.  And you can copy any captain from Star Traders (free) to Elite!This epic space opera is a hit with fans of Star Wars, Firefly, Serenity and Battlestar Galatica.  Your command of the ship is under constant threat, both internal and external.  Can you manage your resources, crew, officers well to enough to turn a profit on your contracts and trades?  Those that do will be among the Faction's elite Star Heroes -- and those that fail will be branded bandits and Crimelords.Star Traders is on Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/startradersGame Development Blog:http://tresebrothers.blogspot.com/Web:http://www.tresebrothers.com/Join the Community Forum:http://startradersrpg.proboards.com/#category-2Twitter:http://twitter.com/#!/TreseBrothersOur Other Games-----------------------Cyber Knights RPGTemplar Assault RPG-----------------------Elite and Free Editions

reviews.title: Best game for my phone period
reviews.comment: Really good game and trese is still adding to it seems to be updating it.  I would really like to see banks added to the game. The ability to store money in a faction bank and pick it up at multiple worlds belonging to that faction.  Also, the ability to secure loans from the bank or less reputable sources....the amount you could borrow could be related to your rank, your level, and the difficulty.  If you borrowed from the bank and defaulted, that faction\'s navy could attempt to collect or imprison you.
reviews.author: Peter Piper

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Not to bad of a game just wish that onve you bought elite that everything that states elite is now available
reviews.author: Timothy Rodriguez

reviews.title: I  am unsure.
reviews.comment: It seems difficult to keep track of all the different factions.
reviews.author: Michael Ryskiewicz

reviews.title: Sooo Much Fun!
reviews.comment: What can I say other than a fantastic game. I go really hooked on the first day and got eye strain as I had never played a game for that long on a mobile phone. Glad its compatible with the tablet. Most games on phones I find are mainly casual even the ones that aint meant to be. Its not that the developers dont try hard its just one of thoa things with mobile/portable gaming you are always surrounded by distractions. However I say this with this game I had to go lock myself in a room with it! I am a big fa
reviews.author: Jason Fury

reviews.comment: An excellent game with layers of fun
reviews.author: matt clark

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Scratches that old school space RPG itch perfect. Updated often despite its age. Runs flawlessly.
reviews.author: Rob McKinney

reviews.title: Amazing.
reviews.comment: Have followed the Trese brothers since this game came out. Every game is of the same calibre as the next. Well done, well worth the 5 stars!
reviews.author: Trever Finck

reviews.title: love it
reviews.comment: excellent
reviews.author: steve smith

reviews.title: Favorite Android Game!!!
reviews.comment: I download the free version the first day I had an android phone. Didn\'t take long to buy elite... Been using this game on a regular basis ever since!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great offline game
reviews.author: Ayrion Frank

reviews.title: Pleasant Surprise
reviews.comment: Surprisingly engaging gameplay. I can do whatever I would want to do with a starship, and there are some fun emergent story elements that elevate this beyond a rougelike.
reviews.author: Jubal DiGriz

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: This is a great RPG game, one of my favorite games.
reviews.author: Cole Daubenspeck

reviews.title: Excellent Game
reviews.comment: This game has helped me through some hard times.
reviews.author: Roy Roberts

reviews.title: Outstanding!!!!!!!!\"\"
reviews.comment: It takes time to get it down but is worth the time to learn because once you get it its really deep
reviews.author: brian wingard

reviews.title: Addicting!
reviews.comment: I just can\'t seem to put it down sometimes!
reviews.author: Aric Capel

reviews.title: Great fun, addictive!
reviews.comment: Fun and addictive, something quick that you can play a few rounds and save if you only have a couple of minutes - or an entire day! Big learning curve! I\'ve owned this game for years now and it still gets two updates a week, sometimes more!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Game!
reviews.comment: Hyphen-inducing turn-based space-faring adventure-simulation. Constantly updated, tweaked, and improved. My favorite space sim since PNP Star Frontiers. Try the free version.
reviews.author: Nate Legler

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: @ Steve. I get the feeling its not complete either. Trese carried over some of the fluff from this game into their tactical battle armor game, suggesting a wider scope or Canon. Been playing this game since 2010. Love it, and represents what i love about android phones= fledgling 3rd party developers to encourage new ideas.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: simply hooked
reviews.comment: I played this endlessly on my holiday, even on a small phone screen.  Could do with a storyline to let you achieve something more than just contracts and reputation, but otherwise perfect.
reviews.author: Jonathan Hastings

reviews.title: Lol how awesome
reviews.comment: This is perfect when youre bored or taking a dump. I love it!
reviews.author: Andreas Larsen
